1.content:
Our story begins in a small village of Pokemons, known as Sierras. A lot of different Pokemon can be found here in this peaceful place. It's tradition, that young Pokemon when reaching the age of 10 have to leave the village to find there place in the world and might return one day as adult. Sadly many young children where never seen again. It's unknown if these Pokemon died or just found there luck somewhere else aside from Sierras.

It's the night of the day of your 10th birthday and you know that you have to leave the village by tomorrow morning. Of course you are nervous and maybe afraid of the unknown future that lies ahead of you. The moon shines bright this night and even and you can see the little backpack you packed for the journey.

You know that you have to sleep to be fully refreshed for your adventure but you can't sleep. Many thinks where lurking around in your head. Will you find your destiny? What awaits you? Will you survive? It was well known to you that many didn't return from their journey. You hope that it will be fun to travel around the world, to see many of the mystical happenings which occurred in the world around you. It is almost midnight as you finally fall asleep.

But before we can start our great adventure you have to tell me something. Please, tell me what kind of Pokemon are you?
1.title: Night before the great adventure.

11.content:
You have chosen to be a Riolu. Known for your bravery and determination you are well suited for the adventure that lies ahead. The training to master the Aura and and Hand-to-Hand combat allows you to face the dangers head on and with confidence.

But of course the training had its downsides. You hadn't much time to spent with friends and the enjoy the benefits of being a child. So you quiet happy that you can leave the village behind and with it the constrains of your strict parents.

But there is still one last thing which has to be settle before you can leave the village.
Please tell as are you a male or female?
11.title: A Riolu you be!

111.content:
The next morning as the Alarm of your clock rings you instantly sat up straight in your bed. Finally the day has come. After you stretched yourself and then you jump out of your bed making yourself ready. As your leave your room your father was already waiting at the door step. “Good morning my son. Ready for your journey?” He asked your formally. He was, of course, a Lucario and well known in the village. Some citizen though of him as a a proud man who raises his child strict and with discipline. “Good morning dad. Uhm.. Yes I packed my stuff yesterday already.” you answered him with a little bit uneasiness in your voice. Actually you weren't ready for it but here is absolutely no way you could tell him that. They morning pasted pretty standard with the exception that your neighbors came over and wished you good luck and told some more or less helpful tips about surviving in the wild.

After you finished everything you planned to do before breaking up were told to meet up with the major at the village center. It was also part of the tradition that the major wishes the young Pokemon which are leaving the village good luck and present them a small gift might be useful on the journey.

You grabbed your back make and make your way out of the house and through the streets to the marketplace where u suppose to met the major. As you arrived there you could already see the major. He was a old Alakazam. He greeted your friendly. “Hello there young one. I hope you had a good morning. Here this is for you.” greeted you by using telepathy and handed you over a small package. After you opened it you held an little white shimmering crystal in your paws. You were wondering what it supposed to be but your thought got interrupted by the Alakazam. “From this moment you are on your own. I wish you luck my little one.”

You stuffed the crystal into your backpack and then you planned in which direction you want to set off.

You could leave the village to the west into the forest which lead into inner parts of the land.

You also could leave the village to the north and try your luck in the mountains.

The last option was to go east where the sea was. Maybe a nice holiday trip?
111.title: A great Adventure begins!

choices: Nah, just a branch of the bush.
1111.content:
You sight quietly. The time to leaves has now really come. You decided to head west into the woods. It seems to be the safest way to start your journey. As you make your way to the western gate of the village you felt a little bit sad. You hoped your parents came to wish you also good luck or just be there.

You arrived at the gate and of course you looked back still hoping that your father or mother showed up. But nothing... It was always this way, your parents where to proud to show afraid to shed a tear. To be honest you were quiet happy that you can escape the strict rules of your parents and make your own decisions.

As you step through the gate your journey has finally begun. You follow the small dusty road which leads directly into the forest.

You entered the forest you can finally leave the open road. It was a hot summer day and you enjoyed the cooler air here in the forest than the one in the open. On the other hand your vision was obscured by all the trees and bushes. But you weren't afraid of anything. You never heard about something dangerous around the village.

After about two hours wandering through the forest you get hungry. Of course you could eat some of your supplies but you decided instead to look for some fruits and to safe your stuff for emergencies.

You found some bushes with delicious looking berries. Happily you approach the bushes and then you reached out for the berries. After you collected a few grabbed something strange. You were wondering what it was.
1111.title: West, Into the Woods!

11111.content:
You grabbed something strange. It was to soft to be a berry, unless it was a foul berry. Furthermore it was to not hard enough to be a a branch of the bush. Suddenly the bushes start to shake heavily. In a moment of surprise you fell over and landed your butt. You then watched the bush as it shakes and you were wondering what you will see.

Suddenly you see what it was. It's a ...
11111.title: Uh-Oh it was a Pokemon!

choices: She seems to be friendly. Trust her.
She tricked you to trust her!
111111.content:
You realize that the Pokemon which you see was a Meganium. It looked down at you. Some berries were hung out of it's maw. You were afraid to move. The Meganium pulled the berries into it' maw and chewed them slowly and then gulped them down. “I'm really sorry to bother you.” you said hasty and nervous. You don't know what else to to do. The Meganium moved it's head down, closer to you. You consider to run away, but your were to scared to stand up. It was strange. Normally you wouldn't be afraid and also normally stay your ground. Maybe it was this way because you know that your parents could not help you or maybe because you never had such big “opponent” than this Meganium. “Oh don't be afraid little one.” The Meganium suddenly said ti you. Relating to the kind of voice the Meganium appeared to be female.

“You are new in this forest aren't you little one?” she asked you and smiled. It seems that this Meganium wasn't that bad at all. Maybe this is your lucky day. “Yes, I'm coming from the village to the east of here.” You answered with confidence and you were able to stand up. The Meganium watched you with curiosity. “Oh? An other kid from that village?” She asked surprised.
111111.title: It's a Meganium!

choices: Trust her. Let her devour you alive.
Get the hell out of here!!
1111111.content:
“It seems I'm not the first one who passed by?” You asked wit curiosity and approached her a little bit. She raised her head and looked into the distance before she looked at you again. “Of course you're not. From time to time children are passing by. On a journey to become adults, they said.” The Meganium told you and you were listing carefully. But your not really surprised about that. The forest was close the to village so it would be strange if none of the previouse children din't passed by.

“I'm just happy that the first person I meet, doesn't want to eat me or doe something else to me.” you said with relief. The Meganium gave you some strange look and you got nervous again. “If you wish I could eat you.” she said. And to be honest the fact that she talked so freely about it scared you more than the fact to be eaten.

She looked at and started to giggle a bit as she saw your fear and confusion. “The one I ate before you said, they liked it very much.” You were indeed confused. What hell was she talking about? Did she eat some of the children before him? It almost sounds as of they survived her belly. It was strange. One part of you wanted to ran like hell to get away from her. The other part was interested in her offer.

What do you want to do?
1111111.title: She seems to be friendly. Trust her.

11111111.content:
You give in. “Okay lady. Please go on I'm yours.” you say and you can see that she brightly smiles at you. “Oh joy! We both wont regret it. Believe me in that.” she said happily. You watch her with curiosity and nervousness. After a few moments as vines slowly emerges behind the flower leafs on Meganium's neck. With that vine she reaches for you. You watch the vine approaching and as it reaches you it moves slowly around you once and then it wraps softly around your waist. The grip on your body wasn't very strong but strong enough to lift you into the air. After a moment of carrying you trough the air the Meganium brought you stops you in front of her head.

“Before we will start. Please, little one. Tell me your name.” She asked while you dangle with your feet in the air. For some strange reason you feel quiet comfortable in her grip. Maybe because your parents were never that soft to you. “My name is Senji. Nice to meet... I guess.” It was till strange to tell her your name because she was about to eat you soon.

“ What a cute name little one. So are ready to travel down to my belly?” She asked you politely. This was you last chance to decide against it. What will you do?
11111111.title: Trust her. Let her devour you alive.

111111111.content:
Meganium smiled happily again as you told her that she can start to eat you. “Okay! I'm so happy. Just relax and enjoy the trip.” she said to you and open her wet maw. Normally you should scream and fighting back to avoid the maw but hold still and just watch the gaping maw closing in. You could feel the warm mushy smelling breath of the Dino. As maw was close by you saw the tongue playfully whipping up and down and reaching for your face. As the warm meaty tongue touches your snout your shiver for a moment but then you fell it quiet pleasant. Meganium used that tongue to lick all over your face. You enjoy the washing tongue, the warm and wet feeling all over your face. You didn't see that your head was already inside the maw of Meganium. You only realized that as the jaws clamp down on your shoulders. It came suddenly that you flinched for a moment but you almost instantly relaxed again as you feel the tongue moving underneath you wrapping itself around your body.

The grass Pokemon used it' vine to push you deeper into it's maw. Meganium raised her head upwards and retracted her vine which was used to hold you in place. You were hanging up side down in her wet fleshy and warm maw and your feet and tail were dangling in the air. It didn't take long and they also were drawn into the broad maw of the Meganium. Her cheeks were bulging out a little as she starts to push you around in her maw with that meaty tongue of hers. You could hear her humming quietly while enjoying your rich taste.

After a few moments the movement of the tongue stopped and suddenly you start to slide head first in the direction of the throat. You you hadn't no idea what it was but you were eager to see her belly.
111111111.title: Yes, I'm ready, Please begin.

choices: Relax and let her digest you.
1111111111.content:
Of course you did know that this was your last chance to cancel the whole thing but excitement took over your mind. Your snout was pressing against the entrance of the throat. Meganium gulped once and you were pushed into the throat. It was tight in here and the fleshy walls were squeezing you. With another gulp she sends in your shoulders and your head made a nice little bulge at the downside of her neck. While you were halfway inside her neck she to use her tongue to lick your feet. It tickled and you had to laugh a little bit, which was difficult in her tight throat. Then Meganium took another deep gulp and only your toes and half of you tail were remaining in her maw. With another swallow you were completely entrap in her throat. Strong muscles were slowly pressing downwards to your destination. The warm and wet massage you received by the muscle let you chitter happily.

You were a noticeable squirming bulge slowly traveling down along the long neck of the Meganium. She was humming and enjoyed your movement inside her throat and then she used one of her vines to nudge the bulge a little bit. The bulge disappeared into the body of the Meganium. After sometime, which felt like hours for you, you were pressed through a tight ring. With plop you landed in the belly of your predator. The stomach was already half filled with acid which was working on the recently devoured berries. To Your surprise it didn’t hurt you there was just a really light tingle on the part of your body which had already contact to the acid. “Just relax now and enjoy your stay in there.” You hear her voice even through walls of your temporary home.
1111111111.title: You let yourself get swallowed.

choices: You awake later next to the Meganium.
11111111111.content:
You do as she told you. With some effort you could move yourself into a comfortable position. Now you lay there relaxed and a teased and except for your head everything up to your neck was submerged in the digestive juices of the Stomach. Everyone would say that you are the dumbest creature on earth that you agreed to let yourself get devoured alive. And you normally would agree on such statement. But this was different the slimy stomach walls and the heat of her body made yourself feel safe and comfortable.

The tingle on your body parts which were submerge in the acid was a strange funny feeling but it also told you that the belly of the Meganium was slowly working on your body, digesting you and turning you into nutrients and energy for her. Suddenly you felt movement of within the stomach. She has started to trot away to find place where she can relax and digest you undisturbed. Her belly was swinging a bit from side to side and it felt almost like lying in a hammock.

After a few minutes the movement stopped and instead you were suddenly squeezed a little bit by the stomach walls. Apparently Meganium found a place to rest and lay down. Then the belly started to shake a little bit and pulled even tighter around you. It was still quite comfortable but your movement was limited to some wiggle and squirming. Meganium let out a rich belch as she laid down which caused the shaking in her belly. You couldn’t do much more than wiggle a little bit around to please her. After an half hour so you couldn’t resist anymore and you slowly drift into a deep slumber.

You didn’t see or even feel anymore how your body slowly breached apart by the work of the acid. First your fur came off and then your skin and meat slowly melted away. After a few hours nothing was left which could be recognized as Riolu…
11111111111.title: Relax and let her digest you.

choices: You found a lake and decided to rest here.
111111111111.content:
You yawned long and deep, slowly awakening from a deep slumber. You never felt that great that felt right now. As rub off the sleep from your eyes you realize that you were leaning against the Meganium. You were irritated because you didn’t where you were and how you get there. It slowly came back into your mind. You were recently devoured and digested. The scary thing about it was that you liked it so much that you actually hoped that it will happen again. Funny what you have become on your first day of the journey. You decided to rest a little longer against her belly and to wait until she wakes up too.

“Good morning, little one. I hope you slept well.” You heard her saying to you. You turned your head and looked at her. She smiled at you brightly. “Actually I can’t believe how much I enjoyed it and I also can’t believe that I survived the digestion. How did you do that?” you were totally excited as you spoke to her. Meganium laughed happily as she listened to you. “I didn’t do anything special. Tell me little one, did you also received a strange crystal before you left the village?” She asked and you were wondering what she meant by that. Luckily Meganium remembered to take your backpack with her as she searched for a place to digest you. You searched in the backpack for that crystal but it was gone. “Ohm… Yes I had one but I can’t find it right now.” You said while still searching in your backpack. “You won’t find the crystal anymore. As you “died” in my belly the crystal shattered and gave you its power. From now on you will always reform once digested.” She explained to you. You were confused. As far you understand from now you don’t have to worry anymore about predators. “Why didn’t you tell me that before you devoured me?” you asked with curiosity. “Oh, I just was curios whether you were willing to feed yourself to me or not.” She explained and you thought that she was a little bit weird but on the other side you were even weirder that you allowed it in the first place.

“Excuse me please, but I need to carry on my journey. I hope you understand that. “ You carefully explained to her. She gave you a sad look probably she hoped you would stay a little bit longer so she might devour you once more. “I suppose that’s the way it should be… Well, feel free to pass by if you need a belly to rest. “ she said and nudged you with her snout. You gave her a last hug and then you grabbed your backpack and left her behind.

While still thinking about the fact that you actually like to be devoured you wander around in the forest you guess you’re going west again but with all these trees you weren’t able to determine which direction you actually went. Soon you realize that nightfall was imminent and you need to search for place to stay for the night.
111111111111.title: You awake later next to the Meganium.

1111111111111.content:
You decided that you like this place and to stay the night here. You dropped your backpack and pulled a small tent-kid out. After you built up the tent you decided to do some preparation for dinner. While you were doing that you were still thinking about the Meganium and the fact that you got devoured by her.

You wondered what strange events will happen in the future. After you finished dinner you decided to go to sleep in you tent. It wasn’t as pleasant as the belly of the Meganium but it was still okay. At least you could try to image to be in her belly and you wonder ii should have stayed with her.
1111111111111.title: You found a lake and decided to rest here.

choices: A coastal town called Treasure Town.
An unexpected ambush for everyone in other words monster house!
11111111111112.content:
You are abruptly awakened by a Luxray that says, "Hey uhh names Luxlastor a rare type of Luxray that apparently knows volt tackle as well as discharge, shock wave, and in case a ground type appears for some reason I know water pulse and energy ball." You know that volt tackle is a move that is deemed extremely rare because only certain Pichu know this move when they hatch. You say, "So why are you here Luxlas?" Luxlas says, "We have a better chance of surviving if we work together right? Anyways like you I reform even if digested but thing is I am going on a sort of quest to find the seven treasures and help others evolve but if I recall to evolve in these parts we need to find a Luminous spring. Anyways I have another partner named Sarah she is a bayleef at the moment albeit a rather powerful one and speaking of which I see her now." As Sarah comes to your position the three of you realize in a way each of you complement each other very well. What they didn't say though was they had another ally in the form of a Shaymin. You were surprised to see a legendary in your eyes and Shaymin says that its actually a very powerful type of Shaymin because for some reason it dealt more damage than a typical full power Shaymin could. The four of you decide to join forces and your new friends say, "Not from around here are you?" You meekly nod.

"In these parts we are known as team Skylas a very legendary team. We can fight on our own but we could tell you were lost so we are going to help you become a Lucario. We are well known around these parts because well we have seen and convinced legendaries to join our cause." You follow your new friends as they lead you to...
11111111111112.title: Something wakes you up!

111111111112.content:
Something went terribly wrong after you got digested. Unfortunately you didn’t know that the Meganium which devoured and digested you simply tricked you to trust her. Many children before you felt into her trap and each and every one was willingly devoured by her.

On the other hand you died happily and enjoyed the ride into her belly. Even the digestion was a great experience. The Meganium silently thanked you for being a willing meal to her.

Sadly our Story already ends here. You were a naïve Riolu but you died a happy death. Maybe the next child will life longer than a day.
111111111112.title: You never were seen again!

11111112.content:
You were scared about the Meganiums offer to devour you. “Uhm.. Sorry but don’t think this is a great idea. “ you said stuttering to her . She looked down at you disappointed. “Oh, well, I’m sorry to hear that. But believe me when I say that you will miss something very pleasurable.” She said sadly but didn’t bother to stop you from packing the berries and your backpack. You walked fast away from her under her watchful eyes. The Meganium sighted unhappy and started to eat some more berries.

“What the hell was that? What was that for a strange feeling?” you thought to yourself. You couldn’t believe that you even spent a single moment about thinking to accept her offer. From the first day the journey was strange. At least she asked you if you wanted to be devoured and not simply did it.

While you walked carefully through the forest you realize that night fall will be soon and you need to find a place where you can rest peacefully. You found a lake and decided to set up you camp here. It was peacefully and no sight of any Pokemon, well at least no Pokemon that could get potentially dangerous to you.

After you dinner you decided to went to bed and rest. You crawl into you tent and lay down to sleep. It was as comfortable as your bed at home but it should do.
11111112.title: Get the hell out of here!!

choices: She planning to drain your energy!
1111112.content:
You take a step closer to her because thought that she was a friendly Pokemon and wont harm in anyways. Little did you know that she tricked other children before you to trust her. Before you could realize that she trapped you a thick vine shot suddenly from her neck which was hidden behind the flower leafs. You had no chance to dodge it in time. The vine wrapped itself around your body. Your arms were pressed against your body. “Stop it! What are you doing?” you scream as the Meganium yanked you from your feet into the air. She used then her vine to squeeze you tightly. “Shh... Little one. Calm down. Don't worry you gonna enjoy this... Like the others.” She said cruelly as she pulled you closer to her head. “Like the others?” you asked more yourself than the Meganium.

You saw her liking her lips with her fleshy tongue. She seems to planning what she is gonna do with you now. You really need to think of an idea how you can get out of this.
1111112.title: She tricked you to trust her!

11111121.content: Yes... but how? There are multiple orifices on her body.
11111121.title: She will devour you!

choices: She completly consumes your life energy!
11111122.content:
You wiggled in her grip to get free but it was pointless. The vines were to strong, instead Meganium tighten her grip onto you body even more. Breathing became difficult. Then you see a second vine coming for you. At first you thought that she will crush you or suffocate you but the second vine stopped in front of your head. Suddenly the end of the vine, which was a little bit thicker than the rest, opened into three jaw like parts. “What are you planning to do with me?” ask scared meanwhile not trying to get free anymore. “A little bit more patience little one. You gonna feel it soon.” she said and then placed the open vine onto your head.

You were wondering what will happen now. The answer came soon. You could see how bulges were traveling through the whole vine which then disappeared behind the flower leafs on the neck of the Meganium. To make things even worse the bulges were shimmering in light blue. “Hmm... You are such a tasty meal my little one.” you hear her say. Bulge for bulge was traveling through the vine. You suddenly felt tired and you realize that this Meganium was using Giga drain on you by using that vine to transport your life energy to her to consume it.

Of course your tried to escape from her but you were already to weak. You were just able to watch the Meganium enjoying her meal and of course your life traveling within these bulges to your captor, almost giving itself willingly to her.

You got weaker and weaker with each bulge leaving your body. You have already stopped struggling and the only thing you were able to do was to let your life energy being slowly consumed by the Meganium. Then you relaize that the belly of the Meganium started to shimmer in the same light blue as the bulges were. So she already started to “digest” your life energy to strengthen herself. The only question which was open, was your fate. You wondered if she will drain every tiny bit of your life or will she release you?
11111122.title: She planning to drain your energy!

choices: Pass out and wake up in her cave
111111221.content: As your consciousness begin's to fade you
111111221.title: She let you live

choices: She wants keep you as a pet
1111112212.title: Pass out and wake up in her cave

choices: She keeps you for you to recover and do it again
11111122122.title: Or

choices: She wants to raise you as her own
111111221222.title: Or

choices: She wants to raise you as her own
1111112212221.content: So to be clear she wasn't malicious
1111112212221.title: Disclaimer

111111222.content:
It was difficult to to stay awake and with each moment in her grip it became more and more difficult. With your consciousness gone you also loose your hope to survive. Meganium didn't bother that you were unconscious, she continued to suck you dry. Now, with each additional bulge of energy consumed the belly of Meganium was shinning brighter.

The Meganium sucked a few more bulges full of energy from your limp body until one last smaller bulge traveled along the vine of her. “Hmm... You sure were a healthy little one.” She said with some cruel undertone. She detached the vine which was used to drain you life from your head. “ Well I guess this is the point where I should say “Bye”.” she added with some evil grin. After that The Meganium toss your body aside into the bushes...

What a poor little Riolu. You were so young and you died on you first day of the journey...
But can be happy that you have provided a beautiful gras Pokemon with a lot of life energy.
111111222.title: She completly consumes your life energy!

111112.content:
Suddenly a Black Serpent rose from the bushes. The Serpent had golden markings along it’s body and two sharp reddish fangs came from its upper jaws. You were totally scared by the Seviper. It gave you a evil glare and you suddenly couldn’t move anymore. “Well, well, what got ussss here? A little Riolu. “ the Seviper hissed and came closer most of its body was still in hidden in the bushes. You had no idea what you could do to get away. “It ssseemss that today issssn’t you bessst day?” He asked. The worried voice was as fake as it could get, that was obvious. You shake your head in fear. The Seviper came even closer twisting his tongue in front of his face almost licking your snout.

You wonder what will happen next. Was this already the end of your story? Will you end up in the stomach of the serpent? “Don’t worry kid. Your fear will be gone ssssoon.” The Seviper said, but you couldn’t believe him.
111112.title: It's a Seviper!

choices: He loves his meal squirming and wiggling.
1111121.content:
You were still under the influence of Seviper’s Glare and you weren’t able to move a muscle except for your head. You were following the movement of the Serpent. He slowly circled around you still watching you interested. Then he slowly wrapped one coil around your small body as the scaly body rubbed against your skin it felt strangely pleasant. Your head was the only visible part which wasn’t bound by the coil of Seviper. Suddenly the thick coil around you tightens itself around you. The serpent started to squeeze you. It wasn’t enough to suffocate you but breathing became difficult.

The Seviper watched you with pleasure as it saw you suffer in his coil. He even increased the pressure for a moment and then released again. You were defenseless and let the Seviper do with you what he pleased. You wonder how long Seviper will repeat the squeeze and release game and what will happen next. After a while Seviper stopped, probably thinking about his next step.
1111121.title: It's time for Seviper's Meal!

11111211.content:
Seviper stopped to suffocate you but still was holding you very tightly in his coil. As you tried to recover you suddenly felt a wet warm thing on your head. Seviper has started to taste you with its tongue. He took his time to taste every inch of your head and face and you were unable to resist by any means. “Ssssuch a sssweet flavor. Delicious!” stated your captor and you could only shiver in fear. You knew what will happen soon to you and you had no chance to prevent it.

After Seviper had enough of this prelude he opened his maw wide and started to close in. So the Serpent was about to swallow you alive. The warm breath of the Seviper on your head made things not better as you entered his maw. It was warm and squishy in here as Seviper closed the maw around you. To take more of your body into his maw Seviper loosens his grip onto your body a little bit. This was probably the last chance to break free but the squeeze had weakened you too much to fight. As he reached you’re your waist your snout was already pressed against the entrance of his throat. Suddenly Seviper pulled you completely out of his coil and lifted you into the air. The he tilted his head backwards and you suddenly hung upwards down in his maw.

The serpent used his tongue to tickle your feet, he was cruel one. The wet and warm salvia in his maw meted you fur down and coated you to make it easier for the Seviper to swallow you. Seviper made gulp and the throat flapped open and you were pulled into the throat. The throat muscle ere pulling on your head and with another gulp your shoulder entered the throat. You were bulging out Seviper’s neck as you descend deeper into it. Soon your feet disappeared in the serpent’s greed maw. Seviper was humming quietly as it used his tongue to lick over your feet again. With two more deep gulps even your feet and tail disappeared within the throat of the Seviper. You feel the strong muscle pushing and pulling onto your body, guiding you deeper into the predator. You struggle and wiggles were in vain and only providing pleasure to the Seviper.

From the outside you were merely a small squirming bulge slowly traveling along the long body of the Serviper. After a few moments you stopped and you knew that you reached the stomach of the serpent. You started to struggle again still hoping that you can escape but you were still only able to provide pleasure to your captor. Seviper burped loudly and then slithered back under the bushes to relax and digest you slowly. You gave up to struggle and the hope to see the daylight again. The acid in Seviper’s belly has already begun to dissolve you slowly. To make things even worse you suddenly got squeezed again. Seviper coiled itself up and was resting his head onto the bulge that you contained.

With each passing moment you stayed in the belly of the Seviper you got weaker and your body felt a part. Fortunately the digestion wasn’t as painful as you expected. Anways your life was about to end soon. The Seviper meanwhile fell asleep and grinded happily. Eventually your body slowly disappeared and with it every trace of you.
11111211.title: He loves his meal squirming and wiggling.

1111122.content:
The Seviper gave a nasty chuckle as he watched you. Slowly the serpent slithered out of the bush which covered most of its body. You still weren’t able to move an inch and so you believed this was the end. Soon you notice a big round bulge in the middle of the long body of the Seviper. “But let me tell you something. Today must be your best day ever. “ the Seviper told you and came dangerously close. “I had already a very filling meal. But be sssure. Next time we meet you will take hisss placsse.“ With these words the Seviper turned around and slithered away. “Until we meet a gain kid!” with these word the serpent disappeared in the forest.

You sat there for a while until you realize that you might better keep going before someone will devour you for sure. You know that could have died there and you sure need to way more careful while wandering through the forest.

You reached a nice quiet lake. It was already late and you need to rest for the next day. You drop you backpack and built up your tent for the night. Of course has searched for place where you couldn’t be found so easily.

As the night comes and the moon raise you moved into the tent to rest. All that walking made you tired.

What did you find?

131.title: Shinji, a male Eevee

132.content:
In some other cultures, each birthday was considered a cause for great celebration and excitement. But not for you. For you, each birthday represented you coming one year closer to today… the day that you would have to finally wander off from the village, leaving your family and friends behind as you ventured towards what felt like certain doom. It doesn’t help that you were just generally an anxious person.

You had been overwhelmed by anxiety for this day all year… but by now, you were just numb, glancing over at your backpack dejectedly as you laid in bed. Stupid village. Stupid ritual. Why are they making you leave? None of the other kids seemed to mind leaving, granted, but you? You don’t want to go. As you contemplated this, you didn’t even notice the entire night pass you by. You had gotten so caught up in your thoughts that you only snapped out of it when you noticed the morning’s sunlight pouring in through the window.

Great. Now, not only were you going to have to brave the big, scary world, you were going to have to do it on no sleep.



“Ooooh, honey… you didn’t get a wink of sleep last night, did you?” Your father, an umbreon, frowned as you stumbled down into the living room, bags under your eyes and your pack lazily slung over your back. He sighed as he sat down across from you at the table. “You know what I’ve been telling you. When I was your age, I felt the exact same way. But you know what? Everything turned out just fine. And you’re even tougher and smarter than I was, so I know you’ll do great out there.”

You don’t even bother to reply to him, just staring downwards with a frown on your face. In response, he just nuzzles your side. “You’ll see. You’re gonna look back on this day and wonder why you were ever worried,” he said simply, before hopping down and heading towards the pantry. “But I know we’re not gonna see eachother for awhile. Which is why I made you your favorite…” Your moping was disrupted as a delicious fragrance reached your nostrils… and you looked up to see a huge tray of muffins plopped down in front of you! “Sitrus berry muffins! Eat as many as you like, sweetheart!”

You stare at his smiling face for a moment, before sighing, unable to resist. “Thanks, dad…” With that, you started to reluctantly chow down, stuffing the delicious muffins into your maw in the hopes of quelling your anxieties. It works alright… but before you know it, you’ve burned through your entire plate! You let out a shuddering burp as you lean back in your chair, grunting as you knead your paws into your big, stuffed full belly. Well… at least you won’t have to eat anything else today…

With that, it was off to the town gates. You huffed and puffed as your now huge, round belly swayed beneath you with every step, but eventually, you made it to the crowd of Pokemon that had been waiting for you. They all cheered and wished you good luck, and gave you all sorts of gifts and trinkets to take with you on your travels. All the while, you did your best to fake a smile, trying to act like you were actually excited to leave, like most kids were.

The celebration was over mercifully quickly, and soon, all that was left was for your dad to give you one last, big, long hug. “I love you, sweetheart. Never forget that.” He whispers. And with that, you just have to walk away, out into the forest, while everyone in town stands at the gate, happily waving you goodbye. You want to take one last look at the village, but you don’t dare turn around… if you did, they’d all see just how much you were crying.

Even once you were out of eyesight, you kept walking for as long as you could, but eventually, you just had to collapse onto your heavy belly and bury your face in your paws, so you could let it all out.



“Hey, kid. Are you alright?”

Startled, you look up to see a pudgy raichu looming over you, looking vaguely concerned when he sees how red your eyes are. You were embarrassed to be seen like this. You had no idea how long you’ve been crying. But that embarrassment was quickly replaced with fear! You remembered that you weren’t supposed to trust the Pokemon on the outside! Terrified, you backed away a bit… but he just patted your head.

“Hey, c’mon. No need to get all scared. If I wanted to eat ya or something, I would’ve already,” he says confidently, trying to soothe your fears. You cringe when he reaches down a paw and takes a handful of your belly, squishing and kneading it a bit. “Although honestly, with a belly like this, you’d definitely be scrumptious. Hah!” With that, he leaned his head back and let out a big, jolly, guttural laugh, patting his own belly happily. This, obviously, failed to reassure you.

“J-just...” You whimper. “Leave me alone!”

He frowned, crossing his arms. “Oh, c’mon. You just got kicked out of that village, right? You’re probably scared, confused, alone… don’t you need a place to stay?” You wanted to ask how he knew that, but before you could speak up, he continued. “I’ve got a couple of pals in a comfy cabin just a lil north of here. If you’d be willing to do some chores for us, we’d be happy to keep you fed and safe!”

You paused, unable to help considering it. He… was a little creepy, but… he did seem nice. And like he said, if he had bad intentions, he would’ve just grabbed you already. Besides, you were really desperate not to have to take on this big, scary world all by yourself. You knew it was crazy, but some part of you wanted to trust him...
132.title: Akira, a female Eevee

1321.content:
“Y-you...you really aren’t going to eat me?” You looked up at the pudgy Raichu, acknowledging that his assessment about you was regrettably true. You were scared, and you were confused...but perhaps you did not have to be alone. You had your doubts, to be sure, but you were willing to give this stranger the benefit of the doubt, if only because he was the clearest path to go on.

The Raichu gave you a warm smile and rubbed a paw over your head, trying to calm you down. “Nah, you’re too cute to eat.” He smirked as he slowly wrapped his arms around your body, pulling you into a hug. You gasped a bit from shock, but soon eased into the hug and returned it, your small form sinking into his chubby, white belly.

“T-thank you…” You offered, scared that you may have been too trusting, but happy nonetheless that you had someone to lean on in this big world now. “So...where do you live?”

The Raichu gave out a content sigh, enjoying the feel of your body pressed up against him, and relieved that you had warmed up to him. He debated on how to respond, going through several different responses in his head before responding. “My cabin is not too far from here. Follow me, it’s just a half hour walk.” He released you from his hold and gestured to you to follow him as he walked towards his home. Hesitantly, you walk up behind him, getting further and further away from your old village.

As the two of you walked along the forest path, you decide to break the rather pregnant silence in the air by making some small talk. “So, w-what were you doing around the village? Half an hour is kinda a long way to walk.”

The Raichu noticed the slight stutter you seemed to still possess, but didn’t bring it up “The berry bushes around that place come full bloom every couple of weeks. You caught me on my on one of my runs. It takes a lot to keep guts like ours filled for long, you know~” The Raichu patted his ample belly again, letting out a soft murr.

“Guts? Like, plural?” You question, a little bit of fear creeping up on your spine.

“Yeah, like I said I gotta cabin with a couple of pals. You can stay for as long as you like, as long as you do a little bit of work.” The Raichu explains, trying to be as gentle about the topic as possible. “Don’t worry, it won’t be too bad. Besides, as cute as you are, you’ll be a smash hit with the others.”

“What kinda work? I’m ready to do it, I just...wanna know what It is before I start.” You walk up to the Raichu’s side to get a better look at him.

“We’ll lay down the ground rules when we get there. It’ll be fine.” The Raichu rested his flabby arm on your head, flattening your ears against your skull, using his other free hand to pick a piece of berry from his teeth. “I promise, you’re gonna just love it there. Oh, where are my manners, I never asked for your name!”

“It’s...A-akira…” You try to look away from the Raichu’s gaze, but his paw on your head kept you from moving it too far. “What's your name?”

“Akira…” The Raichu slowly dragged out the name, almost as if he was tasting it. “Sounds pretty, like a sunset. A fitting name for pretty gal~” He didn't give you his name, but you didn’t want to press further. You wanted this ‘relationship’ to be as conflict free as possible. His terms of endearment did elicit a bluish to rise to your cheeks, but you couldn't shake this creepy feeling you had about him.

The two of you finally manage to make it to the Cabin. It was a standard affair, not to big and not to small, and far away from any apparent civilization surrounded by a thick grove of trees. The Raichu led you up the steps to the porch, and you took your seat on a nearby chair as you waited for him to introduce you to...whoever was inside.

Who was inside the Cabin, anyways?
1321.title: Agree to come with him

13212.content:
The Raichu brings you up to the cabin, opening the door for you
"Well, these are my pals!"

You stare at them, observing them closely. Your not sure if you could trust... 1, 2... 3... 4, 5. 5 Pikachus!?
"U-Uh, you said you only had a couple of pals?"

"I just say that. I learned that if you tell people comin' along that there are 5 others, they'll most definitely pass. People don't wanna make us busy, or whatever." He tries to explain it in a calm way, still knowing he lied to you, which he seems to be sorry about.

"O-Ok," You say, stuttering. You're not sure you can trust everyone here, but you'll at least try.

"So, these are my bros-" He pauses for a brief second "Oh my! I forgot to introduce myself! I'm Taren."

"It's nice to know your name now," You say as calmly as you can


Taren bounces up to introduce his siblings in order.

The first one, a bright orange Raichu, greets you with a smile as bright as her shining eyes. "Nice to meet you! I'm Lila!" She says gladly.

A small grumpy looking pikachu, looks away from you and starts walking inside. Taren grabs him and drags him out. "Ya gotta at least say hello"

He looks back at you "I'm Daren. Don't expect much from me" He says stubbornly before walking back inside the cabin

"He doesn't really like guests" Taren tells you quietly.

There was another Pikachu. He was a little too energetic. "I'm Olay!" He said quickly before running around you, straight out in the distance.

Taren looks at him flying off. "He's pretty fast..."

Two small Pichus next to each other both walk up to you. The one on the left has a slightly different ear pattern, which zig zags oddly. The other one has a normal look though.

"I-I'm Twi" Says the zig zagged one, like he's still learning to speak

"I'm O-Oan" Says the normal one, sounding like he's also still learning

Taren pulls you over, bouncing happily. "I'm pretty glad we have someone new with us!" He says innocently.

"We don't have any more rooms... So you should consider being roommates with someone. The younger ones are kinda rude or just too young, so you should maybe come with one of us"

Taren and Lila both look at you, wanting you to choose themself


Who will you live with for now?
13212.title: A Family of 'Chus

132122.content:
"I'll stay with Lila"

Taren looks at you, "Okay, girl" He seems kinda disappointed, but knowing you'll be good with her. After all, being roommates with another girl is probably better than with him.

On the other hand, Lila jumped with joy, "Oh my! I can't wait to live with you!" She hugged you tighter than you've ever felt being hugged. Her chubby legs were pillowing against your body until she let go.

Lila brought you upstairs to her room. Looking around, it seemed quite quaint, but you could tell she was easily hiding something from you. As soon as she walked in, she sat down with you, and hugged you softly again. It was like lying in the comfiest bed you've ever felt.

"U-U-Uh..." You stuttered as she let go

"What's wrong?" Lila asked politely, "Am I hugging you too much? Teehee~" Even her giggles were attracting. You blushed.

"N-Nothing at all, Lila" You said, embarrassed.

"Sorry about all the hugging and stuff. It's just the only other girl here is Twi, and she's too little to understand everything.

"Makes sense" You say sarcastically

Were you just sarcastic!? Woah, you are really growing already.

She gets on top of you "You look kinda tasty, y'know..."

You blush hard, knowing what she's going to do to you. You're also visibly shaking.

"Oh! Am I scaring you?" She said, surprised

"N-No," You say, trying to be brave.

"Well then..."

Lila opens her mouth wide, to show the wide red cave above you. Her saliva drips onto your face a bit, as you stay frozen. She closes the gaping maw, and laughs a bit "Looks like you enjoy it, huh?"

She once again opens her maw, this time, licking you slowly across the face. Her mouth starts wrapping around your face, as you accept what's happening. You are speechless.

Soon enough, your head crawls down her throat, as your legs start coming into her mouth. Your head slips into her stomach, as the rest of your body comes in after. Your surroundings are currently tight. You watch as the hole above you closes, giving you no escape but down.

"Heehee~" Lila giggles, patting her belly softly. She doesn't let out a single burp, which is pretty odd. "You can relax, cutie~" She says flirtatiously.

You're piled up in a hot Raichu's stomach.
Wow.

So, are you going to relax, or try to get out now?
132122.title: Lila

1321221.content:
You found the stomach comfortable, and you noticed it wasn't digesting you, so you decided to relax.

"Hey Lila," you say as you get comfy and noticed that there is not as much room as you thought especially, since even the Pichu's were big enough to swallow you whole, and Lila is much bigger, when you realize the reason is because Lila recently ate, so most of the space is taken by food. "How come I'm not dying"

"Me and Twi are different then the rest of our family." Lila said. "If something is still alive when it enters our stomach then it will stay alive until it leaves our body. So if me or Twi eat you you are safe, but if anyone else in the family eats you, you will be digested. Now relax while you can. There is supposed to be a storm later tonight, and the Pichu siblings always end up hiding in my stomach, so it will be quite cramped later."

"Okay." You yawned, as you fall asleep, therefore missing her mumbling.

"Especially since the first one in there always ends up eating all the food already in my stomach, and will eat you too. Hopefully for your sake Twi gets here first since if Oan eats gets here first he will eat you, and you will be digested." Lila mumbled, though you were already asleep, and therefore did not hear.

Later

You wake up as a loud gulp sounds around you, and you can hear the storm outside of Lila, as you look up and see a Pichu head popping into the stomach thouggh it was to dark to see which one, and unknown to you to dark to see which one will eat the remains of the food, and you

It was...

Twi: good you will be safe in her stomach as well.

Oan: oh, oh you will be digested in his stomach
1321221.title: Relax

13212211.content:
Twi's head pokes out of her throat, and she immediately grabs you. "A snwack!" She said excitedly. She quickly shoved you down her gullet, sending you straight into her. You look at your surroundings, freaked out by the sudden change of location. Well, it wasn't much different, just a lot tighter.

Oan comes in second, as Lila had purposely done so so you could be safe. "Aww! I wanted a snwack!" He says angrily. "Hey, you always get to weat!" She said back. Oan crosses his arms and sits angrily, watching her closely. Twi reassures you as best as she can. "You'll be okway," She tells you. It isn't the most promising, but you heard something about Twi being safe, so you aren't worried. You do hope she can let you out the ethical way.

Sooner or later, Lila lets Oan and Twi out, and you feel the whole ride out. Twi rubs her belly when she gets out, and looks up at Lila. Lila looks at her, "Now let her out" She says. "No!" Says Twi as refuses to do so, and tries to run off. Lila picks her up before she gets away, and demands she lets you out. Twi spits you out, and sits on the bed with a sour face. "So... What do you want now?" Lila asks you flirtatiously, "Wait a second-" She shoos off the pichus, then continues, "So what do you want now?"

You stare at her, blushing. "You know what?" She says, "I think we're done for tonight~"

You both go to sleep, having to share a bed.

The light of the early morning shines through the window, waking you, but not Lila. You stare back at her, watching and listening to her intently. You hear her mumble "Oh, Akira~..."

So, what is she thinking about?
13212211.title: Twi

13213.content:
The main room of the Raichu’s cabin was dark and in shadows. Blotted out swells of some furniture rose from the wooden floor in the dim absence of light. Hugging against the far wall was a staircase that revealed an overhead banister. Drawn across each window was a heavy curtain, and the hanging chandelier from the ceiling had been turned off. Akira went into the room against her judgment, and the electric mouse followed her, closing the door behind him. The room than became almost entirely pitch black, with only slivers of thin bright emanating from the cracks in the window shades.

Than there was a shuffle of movement. Footfalls, heavy ones at that. Soon after that, the lights came on, and Akira found herself in between two other Pokemon, neither of which was the Raichu. There was a shout of “Boo!” that made the female Eevee leap backwards in shock and surprise, inadvertently fumbling up against the soft body of the electric mouse’s belly. “Wh-what the heck?!” The young girl exclaimed to nobody in particular, running around to face her host with a hundred questions on her tongue

“Surprise!” The Raichu cut her off with a warm smile on his lips.

“Su-surprise?” Akira echoed with a fearful stammer. “I don’t...what’s going on?”

“Well, this is your welcome party, of course.” The Raichu announced as if it was matter of fact.

“H-huh?!” Akira contorted her face in confusion and anxiety. The Raichu, now releasing a mischievous grin that he had been concealing all this time, explained.


“To be honest, I was only telling the half truth when I said that I was just getting berries earlier. We’re always on the lookout for Pokemon coming from Sierras. I was just a little Pichu when I left when I was ten, but than I met these guys!”. The Raichu gestured to the other Pokemon in the Room, prompting Akira to turn around.

On Akira’s left was a fairly enormous Greninja who must have been a few hundred pounds over what a normal one would look like. His amphibian skin was a deep sky blue with a cream white stomach that projected out a couple feat, a rotund body supported by thick limbs. Crimson eyes move up and down in his sockets as he looked over her body with an approving glance.

On Akira’s left stood a Snorlax, whose body took up most of the room alone, easily the tallest of the Pokemon quadruplet. He gut was the roundest and most defined, but at the same time was well muscles in his arms and legs, as stumpy as they were to support his weight. He leaned in with a casual hunger in his gaze.


The Raichu draped his arm across Akira’s back and, against her protests, walked her into the center of the room to be closer to the two strangers. “Akira, I want to introduce you to my best friends in the whole world. This here is Peter,” He singled out the round and flabby frog Pokemon. “ and this colossus is Boris.” He pointed out to the Snorlax.

“We found this Cabin together when we got kicked out of the village like you. Since than we made this place our home, and try to help others find their way out here.” The Raichu explained further.

Peter interrupted the Raichu’s speech by circling around Akira, dragging his amphibious index finger across the contours of the Eevee’s skull. “But not a lot of other wild Pokémon are as nice as us, so it’s our job to protect our guests by any means possible.” His long and flexible tongue slurped itself across her chin, freaking her out.

The Raichu smirked and put both of his paws on Akira’s back. “Coincidentally, what you might see as a threat to your well being, we see as an excuse for a free meal.” He said in a hungry quality.

“Although…” Boris came into the conversation, squeezing his own, bulbous, round belly with both of his pudgy paws. “We don’t just limit ourselves to WILD Pokémon…” He shook his stomach a bit, making it slosh loudly.”

“W-wait…” Akira looked twisted her neck around to face the Raichu behind her. “You said...you said you weren’t going to eat me!”

The Raichu smiled and nodded. “Yes, and I still don’t plan on doing so...but I still eat Pokémon, and I said nothing about these guys chowing down~”.

“Even if you are a little light for a snack.” Peter cooed, leaning in close to grin so wide his teeth showed behind his tongue. Knowing fully well that Akira was on the verge of shouting and hightailing it out of their cabin, the Greninja chuckled. “Hey, don’t be scared, ‘lil lady! We’re expert prey reformers.” He tried to reassure the small ‘vee.

“We don’t always reform, ‘though.” Boris nodded, rubbing his belly as he took a seat on the wooden floor of the room, making the whole place shake like mad. “But I could never turn a cutie like you into pudge forever.”

“So…” Akira Trailed off. “You…want to eat me?” She couldn’t believe what he was hearing. This all sounded like something out of a nightmare, but not grounded in reality just enough to know she wasn't sleeping.

Boris the Snorlax smiled warmly, while Peter nodded with enthusiasm. “Well, as long as your willing, how could we say no?” He croaked. He leaned on closer, but not as domineering as before. “But please don’t be scared of us, lil’ lady. We put up a scary front, but each of us is a big ol’ softy on the inside, literally and figuratively. We won’t make you stay if you de uncomfortable, but give us a chance and I think you’ll like it here.”

“This...this is all so crazy…” Akira whispered to herself, but loud enough for everyone to hear. “But...you guys seem to be pretty okay, so...maybe?”

“Fair enough, we’ll give you a week to see if you want to stay or not..” The Raichu nodded. He lifted Akira’s chin up to that they were eye to eye. “We were all like you when we first started out, you know. Scared, not knowing if we would live to see tomorrow. But we had each other to lean on, and that’s how we survived. No one deserves to feel alone out here, and if you want, you can have a place here.”

Akira didn’t know what came over her. She was still scared out of her mind about the concept of being eaten...but the Raichu’s words comforted her in a way she didn’t fully understand. She hugged her host as tight as she could around his soft, warn belly. “Thank y- you…”

The Raichu smiled and took a step back to beam a happy, hungry smile at the Eevee. “You’re very welcome, Akira. Now, why don’t you get acquainted with your rooms for the week?” He marched up the stairs to the bedrooms, leaving Akira alone with the grinning, chubby predators.

“Mmm. Arceus, I’m starving.” The Greninja drooled with a rub of his white stomach.

“Hehe, take it slow they're, Peter! The poor kid is probably scared out of her mind.” Boris patted his gigantic belly, gesturing to the Eevee to come forward. “Take a load off with me, kiddo. You look like you could use a big ol’ hug.” The Snorlax teased as he appeased the lean form of the Eevee.

Akira blushed, not daring to disobey her new hosts. She tentatively walked forward and climbed up the Snorlax to take a seat on his soft and fluffy stomach. Boris drooled down his round front and licked his chops, laying a soft and fuzzy arms arms around the Eevee’s head to hug her close against his fat body. A faint whining gurgle erupted from the predator’s midriff.

Without thinking, Akira began to rub the Snorlax’s belly. It was fat and supple enough to pinch entire folds between her paws, with so much left to play with. She smiled cautiously and added a second frontal paw to the massage, running both of them across the silky and thick fur. Boris tilted back his head, tongue hanging out of his open mouth. He stretched his legs out on the floor, enjoying his tubby body getting rubbed by the Eevee. “Ah...ah you give a great belly rub, kiddo…” The Snorlax purred.

Boris’s hold on Akira tightened, not uncomfortably, but still strong. The fat paw slowly slid up the Eevee’s neck, ruffling her ears a bit before pushing her face against his belly. Her face was squished against the soft body, and all the while she kept rubbing everything she could get her paws on. All the while Boris just hugged tighter, so closely that she could hear and feel the grumbling of the hungry organ deep inside. It wanted food. It wanted Akira. Was she ready for this?
13213.title: A Bunch of Chubby Predators
